transcript: Layla and I have always lived on less than 10 of what we make I don't even think we spend that now we probably spent about five percent of what we make still a lot of money but it's not a lot relative because we're both actually pretty risk-averse but we're not illogical I was having a conversation with my father-in-law and he offered to pay for her lunch and I was like while we have waited in line I have made more money than this lunch cost let me cover lunch it really depends on your savings versus spending percentage that you're comfortable with
